notes.title: Welcome to Noto 📝
notes.content:
To get started, click the 'New Note' button on the sidebar.

Create notebooks to organize notes with a common topic. Add tags at the top each note to further categorize them.
notes.author: Joshua Abad

notes.title: TODO 📃

notes.author: Joshua Abad

notes.title: Known Issues 🐛
notes.content:
- When deleting a note, it's still selected in the folder.
- NOT responsive on mobile.
- When tag gets deleted while in the same tag folder, user gets redirected to 'All Notes', but no list item is selected in the sidebar.
- Cannot move arrow keys up or down in edit note dialog.
- React complains about something in edit note dialog (most likely related to above).
notes.author: Joshua Abad
